title: Pre-existing type error in workbench-client.tsx blocks build
issue: Type error in RecordingSettings useState initialization. The initial state object is missing required properties 'rna_timeout_seconds' and 'max_call_duration_minutes' from the RecordingSettings type. This error blocks all builds of the dashboard app.
suggestion:
Add the missing properties to the initial state object:
```typescript
const [recordingSettings, setRecordingSettings] = useState<RecordingSettings>({
  enabled: false,
  retention_days: 30,
  transcription_enabled: false,
  ai_summary_enabled: false,
  ai_summary_prompt_format: null,
  rna_timeout_seconds: 30, // Add this
  max_call_duration_minutes: 60, // Add this
});
```
Or use a Partial<RecordingSettings> type if the full object is populated later.
